children.textKey: __RAW__All API endpoints follow the pattern /management/{command}. Some commands accept URL path parameters for GET requests - these are shown with the command URL below. Use GET /management/help/{command} for detailed API documentation.

__RAW__Sets the URL space/prefix for the public site. Creates a subdirectory inside the public folder and moves all content there. Use empty destination to restore to root. Note: Site URL changes (e.g., http://domain/web/ when set to "web")
__RAW__URL prefix/space for public site (empty string to remove)
__RAW__Renames the secure/backend folder at server root level. Updates SECURE_FOLDER_NAME constant. Management URL stays the same.
__RAW__Renames the public folder at server root level. Updates all references. Requires Apache/web server config update after rename.
__RAW__Creates a new route with PHP page template and empty JSON structure
__RAW__Deletes an existing route and its associated files (PHP and JSON). Also removes any URL aliases pointing to this route.
__RAW__Returns list of all available routes in the system

__RAW__Retrieves the JSON structure for a page, menu, footer, or component. Options: showIds (adds node identifiers), summary (tree overview), or nodeId (get specific node by 0-indexed path like 0.2.1)
__RAW__Updates the JSON structure. Two modes: full replacement (send complete structure) or targeted edit (use nodeId + action: update, delete, insertBefore, insertAfter)
__RAW__Lists all reusable JSON components with metadata. Shows available slots (placeholders) and component dependencies.
__RAW__Lists all JSON page structures with metadata. Shows route status, components used, and translation keys.
__RAW__Creates a URL redirect alias that points to an existing route. Supports 301 redirects or internal (transparent) routing.
__RAW__Lists all URL redirect aliases with their targets and types.
__RAW__Deletes specific translation keys from a language file
__RAW__Scans all JSON structures and extracts required translation keys
__RAW__Validates translation completeness by comparing required keys with existing translations
__RAW__Finds translation keys that exist in translation files but are not used in any structure
__RAW__Complete translation health check - finds both missing AND unused keys
__RAW__Returns list of configured languages and multilingual settings
__RAW__Enable or disable multilingual support. Syncs translations between default.json and default language file.
__RAW__Boolean: true for multilingual, false for mono-language
__RAW__Enable or disable multilingual support. Syncs translations between default.json and default language file.
__RAW__Boolean: true for multilingual, false for mono-language
__RAW__Adds a new language to the system
__RAW__Uploads a file to the assets folder with validation and automatic naming
__RAW__Deletes a file from the assets folder
__RAW__Lists all files in assets folder, optionally filtered by category
__RAW__Retrieves the content of the main SCSS/CSS file
__RAW__Updates the content of the main SCSS/CSS file
__RAW__Retrieves all CSS custom properties (variables) defined in the :root selector
__RAW__Add or update CSS custom properties (variables) in the :root selector
__RAW__Lists all CSS selectors in the stylesheet, organized by global and media query scopes
__RAW__Get CSS styles for a specific selector, optionally within a media query context
__RAW__Add or update a CSS rule for any selector
__RAW__Remove a CSS rule from the stylesheet
__RAW__Retrieves all @keyframes animations defined in the stylesheet
__RAW__Updates the site favicon with a new image from assets/images folder (PNG only)
__RAW__Updates page title for a specific route and language in the translation file (page.titles.{route} structure)
__RAW__Creates a production-ready build with compiled PHP files, optional folder renaming, config sanitization, and ZIP archive creation
__RAW__Creates a new API authentication token with specified permissions. Requires admin permission.
__RAW__Lists all API tokens with masked values. Requires admin permission.
__RAW__Revokes (permanently deletes) an API token. Requires admin permission.
__RAW__Token preview from listTokens or full token
